name: ban
description: Ban a user temporarily or permanently.

options.name: user
options.description: The user that will be banned.

options.name: time
options.description: The amount of time that the user will be banned for.

options.name: delete_messages
options.description: Whether or not the messages of the banned user should be deleted. Defaults to false.

options.name: context
options.description: The URL of the message that you want to use as context. Defaults to the most recent message.
